example.eg: Irene retained the key in case she needed it again in the future.
example.egtrans: 艾琳还保留着钥匙，以免以后还需要。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 保留, 保持, 继续拥有

example.eg: Kate has a fantastic memory; she is able to retain facts really easily.
example.egtrans: 凯特有着出色的记忆力。她能轻易熟记事实。

example.eg: This compost retains moisture well, so you don't need to water your plants as often.
example.egtrans: 这种肥料能很好地留住水分，你就不需要太频繁地浇水了。

example.eg: George retained a lawyer for his court case.
The village has retained the tradition of maypole dancing.
